page.title: 14ATTITUDES OPINIONS LOCAL
page.content:
{INTRODUCTION
These are the findings of a street survey conducted in June 1985 in Kibworth Beauchamp by children from Kibworth Primary School. A total of 137 people comprising 50 men (under 30 years old _ 10, over 30 years old _ 40) and 87 women (under 30 years old _ 25, over 30 years _ 62 ) were asked the same 14 questions concerning both local and general issues.
{SUMMARY TAKEN IN JUNE 1985 "WHAT DO PEOPLE THINK IN 1985 ?"
{1. Should there be more factories in {Kibworth ? YES _ 33% NO _ 59% DONT KNOW _ 8%
